title: Poweb
subtitle: Frontend Developer
content: Development and maintenance of the digital marketing company's website.

title: INESC TEC
subtitle: Research assistant
content: Analysis of existing solutions to the problem of scientific data management, with a focus on the CKAN, EUDAT, and Magda systems. Following this evaluation, an adaptation of the most interesting (CKAN) was applied to a specific study, the SAIL Project, an initiative promoted by INESC TEC researchers. My master's thesis was the result of this research.

title: Checkmarx
subtitle: Software Engineer
content:
Integration into one of the R&D teams responsible for supporting the company's Static Application Security Testing (SAST) product.
Support for the GO language (with an emphasis on the Gin framework).
Development of a Policy Management platform (a centralized application for defining and managing an organization's security policies).
